title: News24.com | Ekurhuleni clinic closed after nurse tests positive for Covid-19
description: The Duduza Clinic in Nigel, Gauteng, is closed indefinitely after a nurse tests positive for Covid-19.
content:
The City of Ekurhuleni closed the Duduza Clinic in Nigel, Gauteng, indefinitely after a nurse tested positive for Covid-19. 
According to mayoral spokesperson Phakamile Mbengashe, the facility and the surrounding area will be sanitised during the period of c… [+2239 chars]
